summary: A serpent, created by radioactivity, threatens a Spanish coastal town.
cast: Timothy Bottoms|Taryn Power|Jared Martin|Ray Milland|Gérard Tichy|Carole James|Jack Taylor|León Klimovsky|Miguel de Grandy|Paul Benson|Charly Bravo|Víctor Israel|José Canalejas|Eduardo Bea|Teresa del Olmo|Alicia González|Pilar Alcón|José Yepes|Jorge Bosso|Beatriz Savón|José Bastida|Barta Barri|Paco Catalá|Fabián Conde|Alfonso de la Vega|Alfredo Enríquez|José Ramón Pardo|Luís Zagalo
director: Director: Amando de Ossorio (as Gregory Greens)
title: Serpiente de mar
